Okay, here's the breakdown of required visual elements:

*   A vehicle
*   A red traffic light (illuminated red, facing the vehicle)
*   A stop line on the road surface
*   The vehicle positioned clearly beyond the stop line (i.e., having crossed it)
*   Pedestrians
*   Pedestrians depicted in motion (e.g., mid-stride, walking)
*   A pedestrian crosswalk (where pedestrians are likely moving)
